short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a reminder application for filling ADP.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"CompuSystems ADP Reminder" is a chrome extension that opens the ADP URL in a new tab at the user-defined time.

Once the Chrome extension is installed, the user can set their desired reminder time just by clicking the time field. They can also disable the reminder simply by clicking the toggle switch.

Disclaimer:
This plugin needs 2 permission from the user.
1. User Browser history
2. Display Notification

* The user browsing history permission is needed as this plugin needs to use the chrome browser tabs to open the ADP URL in a new tab automatically.

* The Display Notification permission is needed to display notifications in the chrome window during the user-specified time.
